content.rendered:
Custom VIP 2022 French Open Tennis Packages

There’s no better time to visit Paris than in the springtime during the French Open. The 2022 French Open is considered one of the toughest tournaments to win and never fails to produce memorable moments between the best pros in the game. Roadtrips’ 2022 French Open packages are fully customizable so you can see this iconic event your way. Choose from top Parisian hotels, add your preferred match day experiences, and personalize your itinerary with plenty of other extras to make it the trip of a lifetime.

Be there as tennis’ brightest stars converge in Paris to battle it out for the world’s greatest clay court championships: the French Open. This prestigious tournament takes place at the famous Roland Garros Stadium and is the only Grand Slam to be played on a clay court.

Make 2022 the year you join us for this world-class event. Complete 2022 French Open packages available from $1,175 per person, based on double occupancy. To get started planning your 2022 French Open experience, contact one of our Sports Travel Specialists at 1-800-465-1765 or submit a Custom Trip Quote request.
